summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 3E, Page 39 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property located on the southeast corner of N.W. 80th St. and Third Ave. N.W., from RS 5000 zone to BN zone, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (C.F. 287891, Petition of Michael J. Glanz).
